name: lion

A2 (female lioness) a large wild animal of the cat family with yellowish-brown fur that lives in Africa and southern Asia: a pride (= group) of lions
Benedetta Barbanti/EyeEm/GettyImages
someone who is important, successful, or powerful: a literary lion
More examplesFewer examplesThe lion loped across the grass.The lion is a member of the cat family.The girl stood gazing in pity at the old lion in the cage.He wrestled the lion to the ground with his bare hands.The lion slowly reared its head and looked around.
